price: Umunsi tuzakoranya abagandukira (Allah), berekeza kwa (Allah) Nyirimpuhwe, bameze nk’abashyitsi b’imena,
arabic: يَوۡمَ نَحۡشُرُ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ إِلَى ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ وَفۡدٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: yawma naḥshuru al-mutaqīna ilā al-raḥmāni wafdan
